text: Stephen Tyree Early (August 27, 1889 â€“ August 11, 1951) was an American journalist and government official. He served as White House Press Secretary under Franklin D. Roosevelt from 1933 to 1945 and again under President Harry S. Truman in 1950 after the sudden death of Charles Griffith Ross. ==Notes== Category:1889 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:White House Press Secretaries Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Stephen Early
